channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A small Jesuit school in Denver has quietly become a pipeline for powerful Republicans surrounding Trump
item.description: Erika Kirk and Lindsey Halligan, two conservative figures who have made headlines recently, both attended Regis University.

item.title: Tilly Norwood is a warning and a lesson to humans about the future power of AI
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: David Beckham’s company raked in nearly $100 million last year: Deals with AliExpress and SharkNinja put him back on the billionaire track
item.description: David Beckham’s latest wins aren’t on the pitch—they’re in business, with $92 million in annual revenue and lucrative deals that could put him on trac...

item.title: India, China to start direct flights this month as ties warm
item.description: Passenger flights between India and China were suspended after the COVID-19 pandemic and never resumed following border clashes in 2020.

item.title: Meet Mira Murati, the 36-year-old tech prodigy who shot to fame at OpenAI and now runs a startup that’s a poaching target for Mark Zuckerberg
item.description: Murati enjoyed roles at Goldman Sachs and Tesla before making her name in artificial intelligence.

item.title: 10 stocks that not only beat the S&P 500 but also grew their dividends the most
